meta._et_pb_old_content:
Mobile, Web & Facebook Retargeting Done Right

Bring all your retargeting advertising together into one powerful application. Set up in minutes.  See results immediately. Try it today and get a $100 credit. Try it for FREE today »

One Solution for all of Your Retargeting Needs

Web

Display your ads on the web's top sites  

Facebook

In the news feed and beyond. Ideal for awareness  

Shopify

Seamlessly integrate your storefront with your retargeting efforts  

Dynamic

Amazingly effective, personalized product/shopping ads  

Mobile

Re-engage lost mobile users across smartphones and tablets  

Twitter

Get more sales by retargeting your lost visitors on Twitter for desktop AND mobile  

Hubspot

Connect your HubSpot account to SharpSpring Ads and save time, advertise better, and get more customers  

Cross-device

Retarget lost web site visitors across mobile phones and tablet devices  

20x ROAS

5-10x Above Expectations
“ROI was off the charts – we made a ton of money” – Milt Deherrera / Web Marketing Manager
 

Every Feature You Could Ever Want, at No Extra Charge

Conversion and Revenue Tracking

Measure the impact of ad views and clicks on conversions, revenue and more

Powerful Targeting

Target users based on actions you define on your website or in your app

Transparent Billing

Understand every dollar spend with detail invoices sent to your inbox

Ease of Use

The easiest retargeting solution. Incremental sales without incremental effort

Detailed Analytics

Key stats like click, conversions and revenue updated every 2 hours

Cross-Device Targeting

Reach your visitors across desktop, mobile and tablet, using our Identity Graph

Flexible Retargeting Window

Respond immediately or over time to match your sales cycle

World-Class Customer Support

Consider us an extension of your marketing team, ready and willing to assist when needed
400% Increase in ROI
"ROI was off the charts – we made a ton of money... we were getting at least a 20x return" American Apparel
134% Boost in Incremental Revenue
"It’s rare that you work with a third party that you can trust and have your best interests in mind." 99 designs
20x Reduction in RetarGeting CPA
"SharpSpring Ads being so responsible allows me to be more responsible to my team." InstaEDU

Thousands of Happy Customers

Start Retargeting Today with SharpSpring Ads

Check out all the features and try out a number of channels to see if retargeting works for you. Try it for FREE today »
